Sacai


This project aims main to help cyclists and make their ride more safer.

About Name


The name of project was inspired in Tupi language (Tribe from Brazil). The original name is "Ã§a-cai" and means restless eyes, the natives called some species of monkeys by this name. The ideia of restless eyes reflects the main objective of this project, in case give more "eyes" for cyclists in their bikes. Finally this project isn't restrict for bike, any people that wish to use this project in other local are free to do this.
